rules.communication1: Um das Spiel zu besiegen und alle Karten ablegen zu können, müssen alle Spieler gut kommunizieren. Use the chat, um dich mit deinen Mitspielern abzusprechen.
rules.communication2: Apart from the chat you can use the intervention buttons next to the stacks. The hand icon urges the other players, to not play a card on the respective stack. The shield icon announces that you can save a stack.
rules.general1: The game is based on a collaborative approach. All players work together as a team to team with the goal of beating the game. This is when all 98 playing cards have been placed on the four discard piles.
rules.general2: Two stacks (1 and 3) may only be used in descending order, and two stacks (2 and 4) may only be served in ascending order.
rules.onfire1: The basic rules in the "On Fire" mode correspond to those of the classic game. However, all the cards in the eleven-row between 22 and 77 now have a fire symbol and must be covered at the latest in the round after they were laid. Otherwise the game is lost!
rules.onfire2: In the example, the player must cover the 77 with the 78 in this move. Otherwise, the players lose the game!
rules.save1: The stacks cannot be operated exclusively in one direction. In steps of ten stacks can be served in the opposite direction. This step is called a save or backward trick.
rules.save2: In the example, stack number 3 could be served from the player's hand cards with the 80 and then with the 90, and can thus be saved almost to the maximum.
rules.save3: Tell your teammates about a possible save by clicking the shield icons by the corresponding stack.
